titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4061) to advance cybersecurity research, development, and technical standards, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-410, by Mr. Arcuri.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. The Chair may entertain a motion that the Committee rise only if offered by the chair of the Committee on Science and Technology or his designee. The Chair may not entertain a motion to strike out the enacting words of the bill (as described in clause 9 of rule XVIII).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 157.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1051.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 238 - 175 (Roll no. 29).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 176 (Roll no. 30).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/2/2010--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4061) to advance cybersecurity research, development, and technical standards.
